<form class="form-horizontal">
<fieldset>

<!-- Form Name -->
<legend>Create Compute Bucket</legend>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Set Repo</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="https://" class="input-xlarge">
    <p class="help-block">SVN, Mercurial, GitHub</p>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">SSH Key</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="https://" class="input-xlarge">
    <p class="help-block">Copy paste your Bitbucket or Github key</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Multiple Radios -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="radios">Choose Your Language</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="radio" for="radios-0">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="Python" checked="checked">
      Python
    </label>
    <label class="radio" for="radios-1">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="Java">
      Java
    </label>
    <label class="radio" for="radios-2">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-2" value="Jsnode">
      Jsnode
    </label>
    <label class="radio" for="radios-3">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-3" value="Php web stack">
      Php web stack
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Multiple Checkboxes (inline) -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Loadbalance</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="checkbox inline" for="checkboxes-0">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-0" value="Activate Loadbalancing">
      Activate Loadbalancing
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Maximum Buckets</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="0 to 9999" class="input-xlarge">
    <p class="help-block">Set the maximum number of buckets added automatically</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Multiple Radios -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="radios">Select Bucket Size</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="radio" for="radios-0">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="0.5 GB Memory" checked="checked">
      0.5 GB Memory
    </label>
    <label class="radio" for="radios-1">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="1 GB Memory">
      1 GB Memory
    </label>
    <label class="radio" for="radios-2">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-2" value="2 GB Memory">
      2 GB Memory
    </label>
    <label class="radio" for="radios-3">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-3" value="4 GB Memory">
      4 GB Memory
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

</fieldset>
</form>
